00053     CameraManager::CameraManager (Ogre::SceneManager* SManager)
00054     {
00055         this->SceneManager = SManager;
00056         this->DefaultCamera = NULL;
00057         this->ONodes=0;
00058         this->SNodes=0;
00059     }
00060 
00061     CameraManager::~CameraManager ()
00062     {
00063         if(NULL!=DefaultCamera)
00064         {
00065             delete DefaultCamera;
00066         }
00067         while(!Cameras.empty())
00068         {
00069             Cameras.pop_back();
00070         }
00071         while(!Nodes.empty())
00072         {
00073             Nodes.pop_back();
00074         }
00075     }
00076 
00077     Ogre::Camera* CameraManager::FindCamera(String Name)
00078     {
00079         for( std::vector<Ogre::Camera*>::iterator c=Cameras.begin(); c!=Cameras.end(); c++ )
00080         {
00081             if ( Name == (*c)->getName() )
00082             {
00083                 return *c;
00084             }
00085         }
00086         return NULL;
00087     }
00088 
00089     Ogre::SceneNode* CameraManager::FindNode(String Name)
00090     {
00091         for( std::vector<Ogre::SceneNode*>::iterator c=Nodes.begin(); c!=Nodes.end(); c++ )
00092         {
00093             if ( Name == (*c)->getName() )
00094             {
00095                 return *c;
00096             }
00097         }
00098         return NULL;
00099     }

00101     String CameraManager::CreateCamera ()
00102     {
00103         if(NULL==DefaultCamera)
00104         {
00105             String Name="DefaultCamera";
00106             this->DefaultCamera = this->SceneManager->createCamera(Name);
00107             return Name;
00108         }
00109         std::stringstream namemaker;
00110         String Name="Camera";
00111         namemaker << Name << Cameras.size()+1;
00112         Ogre::Camera* tempcam = this->SceneManager->createCamera(namemaker.str());
00113         Cameras.push_back(tempcam);
00114         return namemaker.str();
00115     }
00116 
00117     Camera* CameraManager::CreateCameraPtr ()
00118     {
00119         if(NULL==DefaultCamera)
00120         {
00121             String Name="DefaultCamera";
00122             this->DefaultCamera = this->SceneManager->createCamera(Name);
00123             Camera* tempptr = new Camera(DefaultCamera, this);
00124             return tempptr;
00125         }
00126         std::stringstream namemaker;
00127         String Name="Camera";
00128         namemaker << Name << Cameras.size()+1;
00129         Ogre::Camera* tempcam = this->SceneManager->createCamera(namemaker.str());
00130         Cameras.push_back(tempcam);
00131         Camera* tempptr = new Camera(tempcam, this);
00132         return tempptr;
00133     }
00134 
00135     String CameraManager::CreateOrbitingNode (Vector3 Target, Vector3 RelativeLoc)
00136     {
00137         std::stringstream namemaker1;
00138         String Name1="OrbitingNode";
00139         this->ONodes++;
00140         namemaker1 << Name1 << ONodes;
00141         Ogre::SceneNode* orbitingnode = this->SceneManager->createSceneNode(namemaker1.str());
00142         Nodes.push_back(orbitingnode);
00143         //creation
00144         std::stringstream namemaker2;
00145         String Name2="CenterNode";
00146         namemaker2 << Name2 << ONodes;
00147         Ogre::SceneNode* centernode = this->SceneManager->createSceneNode(namemaker2.str());
00148         Nodes.push_back(centernode);
00149         //placement
00150         this->SceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(centernode);
00151         centernode->addChild(orbitingnode);
00152         centernode->setPosition(Target.GetOgreVector3());
00153         orbitingnode->setPosition(RelativeLoc.GetOgreVector3());
00154         orbitingnode->setAutoTracking(true, centernode);
00155         return namemaker1.str();
00156     }
00157 
00158     String CameraManager::CreateStandNode (Vector3 LookAt, Vector3 Location)
00159     {
00160         std::stringstream namemaker;
00161         String Name="StandNode";
00162         this->SNodes++;
00163         namemaker << Name << SNodes;
00164         Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = this->SceneManager->createSceneNode(namemaker.str());
00165         this->SceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(tempnode);
00166         tempnode->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00167         tempnode->lookAt(LookAt.GetOgreVector3(), Ogre::Node::TS_WORLD);
00168         Nodes.push_back(tempnode);
00169         return namemaker.str();
00170     }
00171 
00172     void CameraManager::ClearNodes ()
00173     {
00174         this->Nodes.erase(Nodes.begin(), Nodes.end());
00175         return;
00176     }
00177 
00178     void CameraManager::ClearCameras ()
00179     {
00180         this->Cameras.erase(Cameras.begin(), Cameras.end());
00181         return;
00182     }

00184     void CameraManager::SetLocation (Vector3 Location, String Name)
00185     {
00186         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00187         {
00188             this->DefaultCamera->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00189             return;
00190         }
00191         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00192         tempptr->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00193         return;
00194     }

00292     void CameraManager::SetAutoTracking (bool Enabled, String Target, Vector3 Offset, String Name)
00293     {
00294         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00295         {
00296             Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = FindNode(Target);
00297             this->DefaultCamera->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt, Offset.GetOgreVector3());
00298             return;
00299         }
00300         Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = FindNode(Target);
00301         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00302         tempptr->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt, Offset.GetOgreVector3());
00303         return;
00304     }
00305 
00306     void CameraManager::SetAutoTracking (bool Enabled, String Target, String Name)
00307     {
00308         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00309         {
00310             Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = FindNode(Target);
00311             this->DefaultCamera->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt);
00312             return;
00313         }
00314         Ogre::SceneNode* Trgt = FindNode(Target);
00315         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00316         tempptr->setAutoTracking(Enabled, Trgt);
00317         return;
00318     }

00320     Ray CameraManager::GetCameraToViewportRay (Real Screenx, Real Screeny, String Name)
00321     {
00322         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00323         {
00324             Ray R(this->DefaultCamera->getCameraToViewportRay(Screenx, Screeny));
00325             return R;
00326         }
00327         Ogre::Camera* tempcam = FindCamera(Name);
00328         Ray R(tempcam->getCameraToViewportRay(Screenx, Screeny));
00329         return R;
00330     }

00332     String CameraManager::GetNodeAttachedToCamera (String Name)
00333     {
00334         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00335         {
00336             Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = this->DefaultCamera->getParentSceneNode();
00337             return tempnode->getName();
00338         }
00339         Ogre::Camera* tempcam = FindCamera(Name);
00340         Ogre::SceneNode *tempnode = tempcam->getParentSceneNode();
00341         return tempnode->getName();
00342     }

00344     Vector3 CameraManager::GetNodeLocation (String Name)
00345     {
00346         Ogre::SceneNode* tempptr = FindNode(Name);
00347         Vector3 nodeloc;
00348         nodeloc.ExtractOgreVector3(tempptr->getPosition());
00349         return nodeloc;
00350     }

00353     {

00376     void CameraManager::ZoomCamera(Real Zoom, String Name)
00377     {
00378         Ogre::Vector3 zoomlevel(0,0,Zoom);
00379         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00380         {
00381             this->DefaultCamera->moveRelative(zoomlevel);
00382             return;
00383         }
00384         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00385         tempptr->moveRelative(zoomlevel);
00386         return;
00387     }
00388 
00389     void CameraManager::ResetZoom (String Name)
00390     {
00391         Ogre::Vector3 loc;
00392         if(Name=="DefaultCamera")
00393         {
00394             loc = this->DefaultCamera->getPosition();
00395             Real zoom=loc.z;
00396             zoom=0-zoom;
00397             this->DefaultCamera->moveRelative(Ogre::Vector3(0,0,zoom));
00398             return;
00399         }
00400         Ogre::Camera* tempptr = FindCamera(Name);
00401         loc = tempptr->getPosition();
00402         Real zoom=loc.z;
00403         zoom=0-zoom;
00404         tempptr->moveRelative(Ogre::Vector3(0,0,zoom));
00405         return;
00406     }
00407 
00408     void CameraManager::AttachCameraToNode (String NodeName, String CamName)
00409     {
00410         Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = FindNode(NodeName);
00411         if(CamName=="DefaultCamera")
00412         {
00413             tempnode->attachObject(this->DefaultCamera);
00414         }else{
00415             Ogre::Camera* tempcam = FindCamera(CamName);
00416             tempnode->attachObject(tempcam);
00417         }
00418 
00419         return;
00420     }
00421 
00422     void CameraManager::DetachCameraFromNode (String NodeName, String CamName)
00423     {
00424         Ogre::SceneNode* tempnode = FindNode(NodeName);
00425         Ogre::Camera* tempcam = FindCamera(CamName);
00426         tempnode->detachObject(tempcam);
00427         return;
00428     }
00429 
00430     void CameraManager::IncrementYOrbit (Real Radian, String Name)
00431     {
00432         Ogre::Radian Rad(Radian);
00433         Ogre::SceneNode* tempptr = FindNode(Name);
00434         tempptr->getParentSceneNode()->yaw(Rad);
00435     }
